reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

*RDA/ Velocity Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap W/ 45 Wicking/ Full Rayon Ω/0.26*

**Testing**

Steep Time/2 weeks % Used/ 8 PG/VG 50/50 Nic%/0

**Mouthfeel**

Light on the tongue and nose, light Airy mouthfeel not very dense I'd give it a 3 out of 10

**Throat Hit** 5/10

**Flavor Properties**

Lightly sweetened flavoring, slightly dull with a light fruit I believe banana flavoring, also it's coming off a very dry.

**Relatable Flavors**

Remind me of Juicy Fruit bubble gum without the juicy part, or fruity round bubble gum balls you get out of one of those quarter machines.

**Off Flavors**

Slightly chalky, and not really an off flavor butt kind of weak.

**Position In The Recipe**

Should work well as a bubble gum base, it needs a little help but a great starting point. There are so many different directions you could take this flavoring from where it starts.

**Pairings**

Other candies such as TFA Swedish Fish, dark berries, tropical fruits, creams  such as  rainbow sherbert, and spices like Anis, Ginger, and cinnamon.

**Recipe**

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/9192#simple_bubble_gum_by_chrisdvr1

**Notes**

Here is a Wikipedia on bubble gum and as always a bag to make it easy to find.

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_gum

http://www.bullcityvapor.com/bubble-gum-cap/

**Rating** 70/100

**Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Bubble Gum
